DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study obtain objective subjective clinical data compare performance two soft contact lens .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Study Two Marketed Spherical Soft Contact Lenses
DOC.detailed_description: The study evaluate daily wear performance Avaira ( enfilcon A ) spherical lens two week wear compare Vistakon 's Oasys ( senofilcon A ) spherical lens .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must satisfy follow condition prior inclusion study : Based his/her knowledge , must good general health . Be 18 38 year old . Be able willing adhere instruction set forth protocol complete specify evaluation . Read , indicate understanding , sign Written Informed Consent . Be exist successfully adapt user soft contact lens , currently wear either study lens evaluate trial . Require visual correction eye . Require prescription +8.00D 12.00D less 0.75D astigmatism eye . Achieve visual acuity 20/25 good eye spherical contact lens prescription . Must able wear lens least 10 work day next 2weeks ; > 8 hours/day assume contraindication . Have normal eye evidence abnormality disease . For purpose study normal eye define one : amblyopia ; evidence lid abnormality infection ( e.g . entropion , ectropion , chalazia , recurrent stye ) ; clinically significant slit lamp finding ( e.g . infiltrate slit lamp finding Grade 2 : corneal edema , tarsal abnormality , conjunctival injection ) ; active ocular disease ( e.g . glaucoma , history recurrent corneal erosion , cornea [ infiltrate ] , conjunctiva , lid , intraocular infection inflammation allergic , bacterial , viral etiology ) ; aphakia Any follow render subject ineligible inclusion : Greater 0.50D refractive astigmatism either eye . Presbyopic current monovision contact lens wear . Can currently wear either lens ( Avaira Oasys ) Presence clinically significant ( grade 24 ) anterior segment abnormality ; inflammation iritis ; infection eye , lid , associate structure . Presence ocular systemic disease need medication might interfere contact lens wear . Slit lamp finding would contraindicate contact lens wear : pathological dry eye associate finding ; pterygium , pinguecula corneal scar within visual axis ; neovascularization > 0.75 mm limbus , giant papillary conjunctivitis ( GPC ) bad Grade 1 ; anterior uveitis iritis ( past present ) , seborrheic eczema , seborrheic conjunctivitis , history corneal ulcer fungal infection ; poor personal hygiene A known history corneal hypoesthesia ( reduced corneal sensitivity ) . Contact lens best correct Snellen visual acuity ( VA ) bad 20/30 . Aphakia , Keratoconus highly irregular cornea To eligible enter study , subject must ALL inclusion criterion NONE exclusion criterion present .
